divs: Sighting DetailsAround 11:20pm on the 21st of may 2012 Me and a niehbor noticed a bright flash in the sky the east but it was a slow flash meening it started out looking like a star, got brighter then died out. We then saw a second flash about 5 minutes later that was almost instant. Around 11:40 we both noticed an odd formation of stars in the east we had not noticed before in the form of a cross. The 2 stars in the middle started to slowly move to the north west and one behind the other picked up speed as they turned towards the north untill they vanished out of sight. We know both stars where stationary at first and slowly picked up speed untill they moved out of sight in the northern hemisphere at a speed 5-10 times faster than the original speed. there where also 2 other flashes of light but we where not able to corispond what we saw with each other. There where a total of 6 strange things that happened starting in the eastern sky and 4 of those items where witnessed by the both of us.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Chisago City
There were no other sightings in Chisago City on or around May 21st 2012
